articles.title: PM Modi reacts to Mick Jagger's thank you note with The Rolling Stones song: 'You Can’t Always Get...' | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Rock legend Mick Jagger thanked India for providing a break from his daily routine and expressed happiness over his visit. Prime Minister Narendra Modi responded, expressing delight that Jagger found joy in India's people and culture.
